entities.name: professor dumbledore
entities.description: Professor Dumbledore is introduced as a deep and amused voice. He is described as coming out of the Great Hall.

entities.name: fred weasley
entities.description: Fred Weasley is mentioned as one of the students who needs to go to Madam Pomfrey.

entities.name: george weasley
entities.description: George Weasley is mentioned as one of the students who needs to go to Madam Pomfrey.

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: Madam Pomfrey is introduced as someone who is already tending to Miss Fawcett and Mr. Summers.

entities.name: miss fawcett
entities.description: Miss Fawcett is mentioned as a student from Ravenclaw who decided to age herself up a little too.

entities.name: mr summers
entities.description: Mr. Summers is mentioned as a teacher from Hufflepuff who decided to age himself up a little too.

entities.name: lee
entities.description: Lee is mentioned as someone who was howling with laughter while accompanying Fred and George to the hospital wing.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as one of the students who went in to breakfast.

relationships.description: Professor Dumbledore advises Fred and George to go up to Madam Pomfrey.
Madam Pomfrey is already tending to Miss Fawcett.
Madam Pomfrey is also tending to Mr. Summers.
Lee accompanied Fred and George to the hospital wing.
